6．卸売・小売業 Wholesale and retail trade

9．情報通信業 Information and communications
10．金融・保険業 Finance and insurance
11．不動産業 Real estate
12．専門・科学技術、業務支援サービス業 Professional， scientific and technical activities

14．教育 Education
15．保健衛生・社会事業 Human health and social work activities
16．その他のサービス Other service activities

都民経済計算年報 令和３年度 Annual Report on Tokyo Metropolitan Accounts for 2021
５　付表  ５　Supporting Tables (単位: 人　Persons)
(4)　経済活動別就業者数・雇用者数(常住地ベース・就業地ベース） (4) Employed Persons and Employees classified by Economic Activities(on a residence/workplace basis)
注) 雇用者数には副業者を含むため、国勢調査値とは一致しない。
Note1: Employee data include multiple job holders and thus do not equal the population census figures.
Note2: “Fiscal Year” refers to the 12 months beginning from April 1 of the year stated.
